pregunta: 10. How does the ACR guideline emphasize the importance of an interprofessional team-based approach in the management of rheumatoid arthritis?
respuesta: The American College of Rheumatology (ACR) guidelines emphasize the importance of an interprofessional team-based approach in the management of rheumatoid arthritis (RA) by advocating for the collaboration among rheumatologists, primary care physicians, nurses, physical and occupational therapists, pharmacists, and other healthcare professionals. This approach ensures comprehensive care, addressing not only the medical aspects of RA but also the functional, psychological, and social needs of patients. The guidelines highlight that such collaboration can improve patient outcomes, adherence to treatment, and overall quality of life by providing holistic, patient-centered care.
